node.display_long_description:
Let’s dive in and explore the world of fishing or just sit back and relax in a mesmerizing scenery together.
Real VR Fishing invites you to the incredible real-world fishing spots to feel the taste of fishing in the Multiplayer mode or to relax and enjoy the stillness in the Single-play mode. 

MULTIPLAYER CO-OP AVAILABLE UP TO 4 USERS
Change your avatar, put on new clothes. Join friends, or meet new people to relax, talk, and go fishing together!

REALISTIC FISHING EXPERIENCE
Different difficulties for anglers and non-anglers. Turn off UI display for the most realistic experience when you are ready for a real challenge!

YOUTUBE & WEB-BROWSING
Need a break from fishing? Lie down and bring up the screen to relax and enjoy or turn up the volume and listen to the music while fishing!

YOUR AQUARIUM
Want to keep admiring the fish you have reeled in? Customize your aquarium by filling it with your catch, and purchase unique decorations from the shop!

nodes.title: Attendance Update Coming Soon
nodes.body_text:
Hello Real VR Fishers

We are happy to announce the Attendance Update will be released on July 5th! Go express yourself with new outfits that come out every week! This update will bring new outfits, an upgraded autosave feature, a change in the leaderboard system, and other quality-of-life updates. You can find more details about the update below.

Attendance Reward System
● The newly developed weekly attendance reward system will reward you with 1 free outfit a week with a special reward every month if you play the game every week. 
A Week will start Sunday and end Saturday PDT.

Upgraded Autosave Feature
● The upgraded Autosave Feature will be active by default. This will make sure you don't lose your progress.

● Even if you factory reset your device or are playing on a different Oculus Quest, as long as you sign in to your account and have internet access, it will load your save file automatically

Change in the leaderboard system
● Now leaderboard points will only be uploaded if you are online at the moment of the catch. Players won't be able to save points offline and upload them in one go.

QOL updates, including graphics enhancement

Happy Fishing!

node.reviewDescription:
Got my quest 2 for Christmas. I’m over 60, and have a disability that inhibits my use of one arm. I’m a long time southerner, growing up on the lake fishing and that was the biggest thing I lost with my disability, the ability to reel. I’d still go sit in the boat for a good time, but couldn’t handle the fight. 

And this game fixed it all. Now, with the pandemic, I can go fish with my nephews and nieces and just hang out, and I get to enjoy the fight when I do catch one. Thank you for the consideration to make this an inclusive game. Sometimes, we just sit in the lodge and chat with a cold one. Only downside is a room is limited to 4. 

My gosh, it’s beautiful and realistic. It’s only South Korea right now, and I hope they expand it to new waterways. I’ll gladly buy any dlc that comes along. 

Now if you could just come up with a way to let me ignore it when folks tell me to put it down, it’s time for bed. Thanks. Can’t wait for the first expansion.

developerResponse.body:
Hi Hoopti-Hah!
Thank you for such an amazing and touching review!
We are so happy to hear that you can get back to fishing and even go fishing with your family members through our game. Miragesoft as a company has always wanted to help people heal in our game, be it with meeting new and old friends, being with family, and relaxing in peaceful environments.  

We would love to increase the room limit, however, due to limited computing power, it is hard to implement it in our game. 
We are currently in the development of the United States DLC. The release date is not certain, but we think it should be out before the end of the year. 

We will keep working hard to provide you with the best quality gaming experience. Thank you again for loving our game!
